aboutMeParagraph1: I paint with oil and occasionally exhibit in St. Petersburg and in online exhibitions.
aboutMeParagraph3: For purchase inquiries, collaborations, please write to me on Telegram or use the contact form.
exhibitionDescription2: Flowers / artwork 'Valley of a Single Rose'
exhibitionDescription4: Various / artworks 'Lady Godiva', 'Dear Friend', 'My Name is Legion'
exhibitionDescription5: Flowers and animals / artwork 'A bird and a flower'
exhibitionAboutText1: Second place at the International Festival of Arts in the category  'Fauna and Wildlife', the Art Gallery of the Eurasian Art Union 'Eurasium' in Moscow
exhibitionAboutText2: Third place at the International Exhibition and Competition of Floral Art in the category 'Floral Symbolism', the Exhibition Center of the St. Petersburg Union of Artists
exhibitionAboutText3: The first place in the International Exhibition and Competition in the category 'Female image and magical realism', the Exhibition Center of the St. Petersburg Union of Artists
exhibitionAboutText4: Participation in the exhibition by W&P Gallery in St. Petersburg
exhibitionAboutText5: Participation in the International Exhibition and Competition of Contemporary Art 'Flower Rendezvous' in the category 'Flowers and Animals', Beijing, China
exhibitionAboutText6: Third place in the International Exhibition and Competition of Contemporary Art in the category 'Realism', Exhibition Hall of the newspaper Jumhuriyet, Ankara, Turkey
contactsParagraph2: suggestions, please write in the feedback form below.
